title: Adalberto Siebens
text: Adalberto Siebens (born 20 October 1946) is a Puerto Rican <a href="boxing">boxer</a>. He competed in the <a href="Boxing%20at%20the%201968%20Summer%20Olympics%20%E2%80%93%20Light%20welterweight">men's light welterweight</a> event at the <a href="1968%20Summer%20Olympics">1968 Summer Olympics</a>. At the 1968 Summer Olympics, he lost to <a href="Habib%20Galhia">Habib Galhia</a> of Tunisia.
